Original:
台北市大安區仁愛路四段345巷15弄5號台北市大安區｜MUU bar 水煙 Shisha 酒吧

MUU bar 水煙 Shisha 酒吧位於仁愛路上，鄰近捷運國父紀念館站和忠孝敦化站，回家查一下，發現MUU在Google有五六百則評論 竟獲得高達5.0顆星的滿分評價。營業時間非常晚 到凌晨05：00。

在松菸誠品看完第15屆兩岸電影展的最後一場電影〈涉過憤怒的海〉 ，心情久久不能平復，太深沉太痛苦太血腥了...

為了緩和心情，決定從松菸散步回家，經過一家可愛的店，想說進去坐坐好了。
點了一杯無酒精的茶
原來是家水煙館
可能是今天身體不適應水煙的味道
坐了一下覺得頭越來越暈，就離開了。

大安區的社交新聚點

水煙
水煙選擇豐富，包括多種口味的果汁、茶葉和香料。店內的水煙師都經過專業的訓練，也可以根據客人的喜好提供合適的水煙。
調酒

New gathering point in Da'an District

It is suitable for being quiet and happy.
Water cigarette
Water smoke is rich in choice, including a variety of flavors, tea and spices.The water cigarette artists in the store are well -trained, and they can also provide appropriate water cigarettes according to the preferences of the guests.
Bartender

Original:
一對會員夫婦曾經來過這裡並獲得了很好的體驗，所以他們決定在這裡舉辦一個生日活動。它位於東區，交通便利，距離地鐵站不遠。裝潢風格遵循工業設計風格，簡潔乾淨，高高的天花板給人一種寬敞舒適的感覺。

工作人員很友好，水煙和服務都很棒。食物也出奇的美味。然而，在效率方面仍有一些改進的空間。我們是下午 6 點到 7 點之間到達的，一樓只有幾個人，地下室只有我們一行人。儘管我們知道餐飲服務可能會比較慢，但飲料的時間比預期要長，儘管它們只是蘇打水和蘇打水，而不是特殊的雞尾酒。點餐系統似乎有點混亂，工作人員必須回來好幾次來確認我們的訂單。我們不想提醒他們太多次，因為他們非常友好，但漫長的等待讓整體體驗變得不那麼愉快。
EN:
A member couple has been here and gained a good experience, so they decided to host a birthday event here.It is located in the Eastern District, with convenient transportation and not far from the subway station.The decoration style follows the industrial design style, simple and clean, and the high ceiling gives a spacious and comfortable feeling.

The staff is very friendly, and the water smoke and service are great.Food is also surprisingly delicious.However, there is still some room for improvement in terms of efficiency.We arrived between 6 pm and 7 pm. There were only a few people on the first floor, and the basement was only our party.Although we know that catering services may be slow, drinking time is longer than expected, although they are only soda and soda, not special cocktails.The ordering system seems a bit confusing, and the staff must come back several times to confirm our orders.We don't want to remind them too many times, because they are very friendly, but the long waiting makes the overall experience less pleasant.

Original: 漂亮的水煙雞尾酒吧營業至深夜。在一個安靜的星期日晚上去了。飲料太甜了，根本沒有酒精的味道。水煙還是相當不錯的。
EN: The beautiful cigarette cocktail bar is open until late at night.Go on a quiet Sunday evening.The drink is too sweet, and there is no taste of alcohol.Water smoke is quite good.

Original: 喜歡雞尾酒、水煙和卡拉 OK 室的休閒氛圍。裝修讓我想起歐洲旅行。現代又藝術。雞尾酒紫蘇梅+梅酒很棒。有人推薦我嚐嚐山豬檸檬，但我完全忘記了這一點。也許下次我會來吃😋位置相當低調。你不會擔心無意識行為時會感到羞恥😆 …
EN: Like a leisure atmosphere in cocktails, water cigarettes and karaoke rooms.The decoration reminds me of European travel.Modern and artistic.Cocktails perilum plum+plum wine is great.Some people recommend me to taste the pork lemons, but I completely forgot this.Maybe next time I will come to eat the position of the pupa is quite low -key.You will not worry about being unconscious and you will feel ashamed ...
